thread.title: Right Before Super Bowl, LOOK What Happens to Tom Brady (All Because He’s Friends with Trump)
thread.title_full: Right Before Super Bowl, LOOK What Happens to Tom Brady (All Because He’s Friends with Trump)

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Right Before Super Bowl, LOOK What Happens to Tom Brady (All Because He’s Friends with Trump)
text:
“Anyone of note who’s supportive of the president of the United States must recant and submit to a public flogging,” Mediaite noted. “Those who fail to comply must be named and shamed.” 
Here are the latest headlines warning Brady ahead of the Super Bowl: Tom Brady has some explaining to do on Donald Trump Prof claims Trump supporter Tom Brady ‘more un-American’ than Kaepernick For Tom Brady, there’s no avoiding Donald Trump during Super Bowl week Super boycott! Anti-Trump supporters skipping Super Bowl over Patriots’ ties to President. 
Gee, imagine that. 
A famous person is friends with another famous person. 
That’s how tolerant the left has become. 
You aren’t allowed to be friends with conservatives without being shamed by the media. 
Awesome…
